attributes.action: Make mental illness as important as physical illness by increasing NHS funding.
attributes.additional_details:
How many people could be saved if there were sufficient funding?

http://www.itv.com/news/2015-07-27/revealed-tens-of-millions-slashed-from-mental-health-budgets/

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-32596748

http://www.nhs.uk/Conditions/Suicide/Pages/Causes.aspx
attributes.background:
We all know that when it comes to NHS cuts, the treatment of mental illness is always the first in line.

You wouldn't leave a broken leg for weeks before getting it fixed, so why do life threatening illnesses of the mind have little to no importance in our society?

More funds will save lives!
